description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing several HTTP GET endpoints including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and app info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing endpoints for greeting, documentation access, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple health status string indicating the application is operational.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
